message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $11,000?
Bob, I understand your position on the budget.  I could meet you halfway at $11,250. This is a very competitive price for a product of this caliber. What do you say?
